effect.diamond-pearl: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

short_effect.diamond-pearl: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect.platinum: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect.heartgold-soulsilver: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user grabs the foe and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.
flavor_text.platinum: The user grabs the foe and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user grabs the foe and recklessly dives for the ground. It also hurts the user slightly.
